00022 /// \brief
00023 /// GisXml is a utility class defining the GisXml package constants.
00024 class GisXml
00025 {
00026 public:
00027     GIS_API static const GisStringP mXmlnsPref;     // "xmlns"
00028 
00029     /// various XML namespaces and URI's declared in an FDO XML document.
00030 
00031     GIS_API static const GisStringP mXsNs;          // "xs"
00032     GIS_API static const GisStringP mXsUri;         // "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
00033     GIS_API static const GisStringP mXsiNs;         // "xsi"
00034     GIS_API static const GisStringP mXsiUri;        // "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
00035     GIS_API static const GisStringP mXlinkNs;       // "xlink"
00036     GIS_API static const GisStringP mXlinkUri;      // "http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
00037     GIS_API static const GisStringP mGmlNs;         // "gml"
00038     GIS_API static const GisStringP mGmlUri;        // "http://www.opengis.net/gml"
00039     GIS_API static const GisStringP mFdoNs;         // "fdo"
00040     GIS_API static const GisStringP mFdoUri;        // "http://fdo.osgeo.org/schemas"
00041     GIS_API static const GisStringP mFdsNs;         // "fds"
00042     GIS_API static const GisStringP mFdsUri;        // "http://fdo.osgeo.org/schemas/fds"
00043     GIS_API static const GisStringP mWfsNs;         // "wfs"
00044     GIS_API static const GisStringP mWfsUri;        // "http://www.opengis.net/wfs"
00045 
00046     /// default FDO XML document root element.
00047 
00048     GIS_API static const GisStringP mDefaultRoot;   // "fdo:DataStore"
00049 
00050     /// default FDO XML document root element.
00051 
00052     GIS_API static const GisStringP mGmlProviderName;   // provider name for GML Schema Mappings "Autodesk.Gml.1.0"
00053 
00054     /// default Feature Member and Feature Collection serialization names
00055 
00056     GIS_API static const GisStringP mFeatureCollectionName;     // "gml:FeatureCollection"
00057     GIS_API static const GisStringP mFeatureMemberName;         // "gml:featureMember" 
00058 };
00059 
00060 #endif
